idea-plugin.name: Xross Unit Editor
idea-plugin.description:
The Xross Unit Editor is a flexible low code tool for building backend module.
Users can quickly build control processes and backend system skeleton in a WYSIWYG manner in IDE using flowchat.
Using flowchart allows user better understanding and maintaiing the system.
Clicking on the process node can directly open the code corresponding to the node. Enable you to grasp the overall structure and specific details of the system anytime and anywhere.
Xross Unit is particularly suitable for building new system or refactoring old ones.Especially for cross language refactoring.
E.g. Xross Unit can efficiently enable developers familiar with old systems and languages to transform their knowledge of old systems into new systems. For more infomation, please visit https://github.com/hejiehui/xUnit
